description: The Apple Cider Mimosa cocktail is a great way to start your day. It's not too sweet and gets you nice and festive for the holiday season.
name: Apple Cider Mimosa
recipeIngredient: Gold and silver sprinkles for rim of glass (optional)
1/2 cup Champagne or other sparkling white wine

recipeInstructions.name: Rim glass with apple juice and then dip into sprinkles.
recipeInstructions.text: Rim glass with apple juice and then dip into sprinkles.

recipeInstructions.name: In a tall glass, mix apple cider and champagne or sparkling white wine together.
recipeInstructions.text: In a tall glass, mix apple cider and champagne or sparkling white wine together.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with apple slices if desired. Add ice to keep cool longer as necessary before serving. Enjoy!
